jungle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a thick tropical forest with many large plants growing very close together
jungle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a situation in which it is difficult to become successful or get what you want, especially because a lot of people are competing with each other
jungle.translation[0].definitions[2].def: something that is very untidy, complicated, or confusing
jungle.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a jungle of freeways and highways
jungle.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a type of very fast dance music
jungle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a situation in which a lot of people or businesses are competing with each other in a very determined way
jungle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Without the free publicity, the firm would be lost in the jungle of TV advertising.
